title: Jon Ronson The Crazy Rulers of the World 2004
description:
Jon Ronson The Crazy Rulers of the World 2004

Journalist Jon Ronson examines some of the more unusual techniques being employed by the US government in the war on terror.


S1, Ep1
7 Nov. 2004
The Men Who Stare at Goats
"The men who stare at goats" charts the history of a secret US Army unit founded in 1979, the First Earth Battalion. The program uncovers the truth about this unit's involvement with paranormal activities that defy accepted military practice, including mind reading and out of body experiences.
 
Funny Torture
S1, Ep2
14 Nov. 2004
Funny Torture
We learn how the New Age movement of the 1980s has influenced interrogation at Guantanamo Bay and in post-war Iraq.
 
Psychic Foot-Soldiers
S1, Ep3
21 Nov. 2004
Psychic Foot-Soldiers
Addresses the US Armed Forces' experiments with mind-control and extra-sensory perception.
